cms.contentitemcommondata.BaseContentTitle: Umbraco Tips for Newcomers: Insights from an Outsider

Wait… you thought this was going to be about Kentico? 👀

Today, I have published my first Umbraco related article in the calendar, 24 Days in Umbraco. It provides insights for newcomers, some tips on how to get started.

Obviously I couldn't write the entire article without mentioning Kentico a number of times 😅

👉 Check out the article.
